title: Please help
body:
I updated my launcher and suddenly I can't play league anymore. Everytime i try to start the game a error pops up telling me I'm missing BugSplat.dll. And i tried to repair the launcher, didn't work. I searched on the internet and found a board telling me to try the hextech repair tool. Also that didn't work so please help me. (Sorry for bad English)


 {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
This is a pretty good sign that something is going wrong with your game files. For issues like this, you'll want to uninstall/reinstall. When you go to reinstall, be sure to turn off any antivirus, as it can sometimes throw a false positive on these .dll's and quarantine them. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
